overview: A true porn original, Candida has been a major figure in the adult film industry since the mid-1970's... She began her career as the lead role in 1975's The Analyst, an early exploration of anal sex. Candida's sultry and natural sensuality won over fans and critics alike, and she was soon a highly sought after porn vixen.  Candida was one of the hottest sexers around with over 50 white-hot performances, including key roles in Femmes De Sade, Outlaw Ladies and Sexcapades. In the early 80's.  This collection contains early, loop rarities such as Cockteasing Anal, Bathroom Strip, Bikini Ball and Pajama Party (a lesbo frolic with Susie Nero). Feature film highlights include scenes from: Blue Ecstasy in New York, Tiffany Minx, Easy Alice, Ball Game, The Analyst, Kinky Tricks, Hard Soap and more. Sexy Laurien Dominique also appears in multiple scenes!
title: Candida Royalle Collection
